function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on information from news articles to understand the use of data analytics in global emergency situations","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of the real use of data analytics and its effectiveness in combating contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Verify information from multiple reliable sources and cross-check with official reports to ensure accuracy","Technologies":"Data verification and validation technologies, advanced data analytics tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Focus on country-specific measures may lead to omission of instances where other governments and organizations utilize big data technologies in pandemics","Impact":"Missed opportunities to learn from successful big data applications in COVID-19 combat, limited understanding of the broad global use of data analytics","Mitigation":"Conduct a broad-spectrum review covering a wide range of countries and organizations to ensure a comprehensive analysis","Technologies":"Global data tracking and monitoring systems, cross-border data sharing platforms","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, international health organizations, and intergovernmental agencies"}]}
